title: Finding the friction force acting on the box

content.question: A box of mass <math alttext="5 kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> kg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is at rest on a rough horizontal surface. The coefficients of static and kinetic friction between the surface and the box are <math alttext="0.3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="0.25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, respectively. A <math alttext="10 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mtext> N</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> horizontal force is applied to the box. What is the frictional force acting on the box?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
